io.spine.server.stand

Class Stand

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.event.AbstractEventSubscriber
      • io.spine.server.stand.Stand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>>, MulticastDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.lang.String>, EventDispatcher<java.lang.String>, EventReceiver, EventSubscriber, ExternalDispatcherFactory<java.lang.String>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Stand
extends AbstractEventSubscriber
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A container for storing the latest Aggregate states.

    Provides an optimal way to access the latest state of published aggregates for read-side services. The aggregate states are delivered to the instance of Stand from AggregateRepository instances.

    In order to provide a flexibility in defining data access policies, Stand contains only the states of published aggregates. Please refer to Aggregate for details on publishing aggregates.

    Each BoundedContext contains only one instance of Stand.

      Delivers the given subscription update to the read-side.

      • canDispatch

        public boolean canDispatch(EventEnvelope event)
        Checks if this dispatcher can dispatch the given message.

        This method does not check that the type of the message is one of the dispatched message classes. Instead, it validates the message upon some custom rules of this dispatcher.

        Extend this method to forbid messages from being dispatched to this instance.

        Always returns true as the filtering happens in Stand.handle(EventEnvelope).

        Specified by:
        canDispatch in interface MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>>
        Overrides:
        canDispatch in class AbstractEventSubscriber
        Parameters:
        event - the message to check
        Returns:
        true is the given message can be dispatched by this dispatcher, false otherwise

      • messageClasses

        public java.util.Set<EventClass> messageClasses()
        Obtains a set of message classes that can be processed by this dispatcher.

        As dynamically changed event classes for subscribers are currently not supported, Stand receives all events produced by the associated repositories and then notifies subscriptions if necessary.

        Also receives EntityStateChanged event class to enable entity subscriptions.

        Specified by:
        messageClasses in interface MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>>
        Overrides:
        messageClasses in class AbstractEventSubscriber
        Returns:
        non-empty set of message classes

      • externalEventClasses

        public java.util.Set<EventClass> externalEventClasses()
        Obtains classes of external events processed by this dispatcher.

        Stand does not consume external events.

        Specified by:
        externalEventClasses in interface EventDispatcher<java.lang.String>
        Overrides:
        externalEventClasses in class AbstractEventSubscriber

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(io.spine.client.Topic topic,
                      io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.client.Subscription> responseObserver)
               throws InvalidRequestException
        Subscribes to the updates of entity state or to the specific types of events, according to Topic.

        Once this instance of Stand receives an update of an entity or a matching event with the given TypeUrl, all such callbacks are executed.

        Parameters:
        topic - a Topic defining the subscription target
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • activate

        public void activate(io.spine.client.Subscription subscription,
                     Stand.NotifySubscriptionAction notifyAction,
                     io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.core.Response> responseObserver)
              throws InvalidRequestException
        Activates the subscription created via subscribe() method call.

        After the activation, the clients will start receiving the updates via NotifySubscriptionAction upon entity state changes or new events arrival.

        Parameters:
        subscription - the subscription to activate
        notifyAction - the action which notifies the subscribers about an update
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException
        See Also:
        Stand.subscribe(Topic, StreamObserver)

      • cancel

        public void cancel(io.spine.client.Subscription subscription,
                   io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.core.Response> responseObserver)
            throws InvalidRequestException
        Cancels the Subscription.

        Typically invoked to cancel the previous activate() call.

        After this method is called, the subscribers stop receiving the updates, related to the given Subscription.

        Parameters:
        subscription - the subscription to cancel
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • exposedTypes

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<io.spine.type.TypeUrl> exposedTypes()
        Reads all Entity types exposed for reading by this instance of Stand.

        Use Stand.registerTypeSupplier(Repository) to expose a type.

        The result includes all values from Stand.exposedAggregateTypes() as well.

        Returns:
        the set of types as TypeUrl instances

      • exposedEventTypes

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<io.spine.type.TypeUrl> exposedEventTypes()
        Reads all event types produced by the repositories associated with this Stand.
        Returns:
        the set of types as TypeUrl instances

      • exposedAggregateTypes

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<io.spine.type.TypeUrl> exposedAggregateTypes()
        Reads all Aggregate entity types exposed for reading by this instance of Stand.

        Use Stand.registerTypeSupplier(Repository) to expose an Aggregate type.

        Returns:
        the set of types as TypeUrl instances

      • execute

        public void execute(io.spine.client.Query query,
                    io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.client.QueryResponse> responseObserver)
             throws InvalidRequestException
        Reads a particular set of items from the read-side of the application and feed the result into an instance.

        Query defines the query target and the expected detail level for response.

        The query results are fed to an instance of StreamObserver<QueryResponse>.

        Parameters:
        query - the instance of query
        responseObserver - the observer to feed the query results to
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • registerTypeSupplier

        public <I,E extends Entity<I,?>> void registerTypeSupplier(Repository<I,E> repository)
        Registers a Repository as an entity/event type supplier.

        In case of an AggregateRepository, the repository is not registered as a supplier for read operations, since the Aggregate reads are performed by accessing the latest state in the corresponding MirrorProjection.

        However, the type of the AggregateRepository instance is recorded for the postponed processing of updates.
